meta.title: Update Channel Listings - Channel Listings - Channels and Listings - Headless Commerce - API Reference
meta.description:
Currently only the following properties can be updated on channel listings:

state

variants.state

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example


...

blocks.data:
Currently only the following properties can be updated on channel listings:

* state
* variants.state

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Channel Listings | modify | `store_channel_listings` |
|  Channel Listings | read-only | `store_channel_listings_read_only` |
|  Channel Settings | modify | `store_channel_settings` |
|  Channel Settings | read-only | `store_channel_settings_read_only` |
|  Sites & Routes | modify | `store_sites` |
|  Sites & Routes | read-only | `store_sites_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Client
* **Location**: header

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Channel Listings | modify | `store_channel_listings` |
|  Channel Listings | read-only | `store_channel_listings_read_only` |
|  Channel Settings | modify | `store_channel_settings` |
|  Channel Settings | read-only | `store_channel_settings_read_only` |
|  Sites & Routes | modify | `store_sites` |
|  Sites & Routes | read-only | `store_sites_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

name.description: Name of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the name in the catalog

description.description: Description of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the description in the catalog

name.description: Name of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the name in the catalog

description.description: Description of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the description in the catalog

channel_id.description: ID of the channel that the channel listing belongs to

listing_id.description: ID of the channel listing that has been created, returned, or updated

external_id.description: Associated ID within a system / platform outside of BC for the product listing.

product_id.description: ID of the product in the BC catalog that the channel listing corresponds to

name.description: Name of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the name in the catalog

description.description: Description of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the description in the catalog

state.description: Current state of the channel listing

date_created.description: Date on which the channel listing was first created

date_modified.description: Date on which the channel listing was most recently changed

external_id.description: Associated ID within a system / platform outside of BC for the product variant listing

name.description: Name of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the name in the catalog

description.description: Description of the product for this channel listing specifically. This overrides the description in the catalog

date_created.description: Date on which the channel listing variant was created

date_modified.description: Date on which the channel listing variant was most recently changed

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
